``` ::: ::: ## Find the Empty Model ## Find the Empty Model $$ \hat Y_i = 0.5698 $$ ## Find SSE $$ SSE = 0.0573 $$ ## Find a Model explaining variability with album ## Find a Model explaining variability with album $$ \hat Y_i = 0.519 + 0.1017 X $$ $$ X = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Midnights\\ 0 & Other \end{array} \right. $$ ## Find the SSE of the previous Linear Model ## Find the SSE of the previous Linear Model $$ SSE = 0.0418 $$ # Motivation: Horror Movies ## Motivation: Horror Movies ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Create the Empty Model for `vote_average` ## Create the Empty Model for `vote_average` $$ \hat Y_i = 4.856 $$ ## Find SSE for Empty Model ## Find SSE for Empty Model $$ SSE = 36.562 $$ ## Find a Model to explain `vote_average` by `genre_names` ## Find a Model to explain `vote_average` by `genre_names` $$ \hat Y_i = 5.4667 -1.1 X - 0.733 Z $$ $$ X = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Mystery \\ 0 & Other \end{array} \right. \ \ Z = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Thriller\\ 0 & Other \end{array} \right. $$ ## Find SSE of previous Linear Model ## Find SSE of previous Linear Model $$ SSE = 34.680 $$ # Motivation: Scooby Doo ## Motivation: Scooby Doo ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: There was 1 warning in `mutate()`. #> ℹ In argument: `zoinks_count = as.numeric(zoinks)`. #> Caused by warning: #> ! NAs introduced by coercion ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Fit an Empty Model on Zoinks Count ## Fit an Empty Model on Zoinks Count $$ \hat Y_i = 3.375 $$ ## SSE of Empty Model ## SSE of Empty Model $$ SSE = 39.875 $$ ## Fit a model explaining Zoinks count and monster type ## Fit a model explaining Zoinks count and monster type $$ \hat Y_i = 2.5 -0.5 X +3 Z +1 A $$ $$ X = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Mythical \\ 0 & Other \end{array} \right. \ \ Z = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Possessed \ Object\\ 0 & Other \end{array} \right. \ \ A = \left\{\begin{array}{cc} 1 & Undead\\ 0 & Other \end{array} \right. $$ ## Find the SSE of the previous model ## Find the SSE of the previous model $$ SSE = 25.5 $$
